SA19n1285:6: tatra ' anantācintyaguṇyaṃ hi ' ityādiṣu anantaguṇyamiti guṇaṃ hi balābhayāsaṃsṛṣṭādiguṇārthe devamanuṣyaiḥ pariceyatvāt,
SA19n1285:13: acintyaguṇatvaṃ tu śrāvaka - pratyekabuddha - sarva - pṛthagjana - sarvatārkikagaṇa - cittagocaraṃ samatikramaṇāt |
SA19n1285:19: sarvadharmānityatvasya duḥkha - śūnya - nairātmyādi - dharmān - pudgalanairātmyasvabhāvatayā yathāvad avabodhatvād buddhaḥ |
SA19n1285:25: yathā - parādhīnasya svayameva pratisaṃvedana - dharmatattvāva - bodhavad unmārgabhrāntacittasya saṃsārāṭavīkāntāre janma- jarā - vyādhi- maraṇādi - pīḍitasya vividhadarśanagahanavane kleśāśīviṣabhayāplutāna itastataḥ paribhramato 'nyāṃścāpi sanmārge sanniveśya mokṣānuttaramahānagare praveśakāritvād buddha iti |
SA19n1285:31: tasmāt taṃ buddhaṃ karuṇātmakaṃ praṇipatya śālistambamiti ityuktam |
SA19n1285:32: praṇipatyeti samyakpūjayitvā vandanā - gaurava- pravaṇatayā praṇipatya |
SA19n1285:33: praṇipatya kiṃ karomīti cet- śālistambamiti sūtrasya upanibaddhaśāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmi |
SA19n1285:41: tasmāt tādṛśaṃ sarvajñaṃ viraktaṃ sambuddhaṃ karuṇātmaka iti yaḥ sarvaṃjānan vītarāgaḥ ,
SA19n1285:42: sa ācāryamuṣṭerabhāvād aparān yathāvagataṃ dharmaṃ diśati |
SA19n1285:50: śāstraṃ racayitum ādau sambandha - prayojana - abhidhānābhidheyacatuṣṭayaṃ kiṃ na nirvacanīyam ?
SA19n1285:60: evaṃ vādine ucyate - asambandhāditvāditi yaduktaṃ ityuktahetorasiddham uktāyām atroktau sambandhādayaścatvāraḥ santyeva |
SA19n1285:62: ucyate - śālistambasūtropanibaddha- śāstrakārikāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇatvād atra sambandhaḥ syād eva |
SA19n1285:63: śālistambasūtramiti tīrthikādyanyeṣu granthaviśeṣaṇatayā anupalabdhatvāt śāstramidaṃ buddhasambaddham |
SA19n1285:66: tasmāduktam atra prayojanam - hetupratyayārthāvagamārthaṃ pudgala - nairātmya - dharmanairātmya - grāhya - grāhakābhāvāva gamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ vibhajya anuttara - samyaksaṃbuddhopalabdhiḥ atra prayojanamastyeva |
SA19n1285:68: yadyad sārthakaṃ tat tat tu viracanīyam |
SA19n1285:70: asyābhidhānena śālistambopamayā ādhyātmika - bāhya - pratītyasamutpāda- samupayogād anenābhidhānena śālistambamiti cāpi bhavati |
SA19n1285:72: abhidheyamiti pratītyasamutpādasya dvādaśāṅgasya sapratyayasya pṛthaktaḥ yathākramaṃ lakṣaṇavyavasthāpanāt kartrādīn ahetūn pratikūlahetūn ca vihāya kleśopakleśa prahāṇāt samyagjñānam utpādya anuttaradharmakāyopalambhād idamabhidheyamapyastyeva |
SA19n1285:86: dharmaśravaṇe jātagauravāṇāṃ śravaṇa - cintana - bhāvanāsu gauravaṃ bhavati |
SA19n1285:87: ajātagauravāṇāṃ tu abhūtatvād hetvarthe ca siddha eva |
SA19n1285:88: api śiṣṭācāra- nayapradarśanārthaṃ śāstrārambhe śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā |
SA19n1285:90: yadā kaścit prayojanārambhaṇamavatarati prathamam iṣṭadevaṃ praṇamya viśiṣṭaprayojanaṃ praviśati,
SA19n1285:92: tasmād anenāpi śāstrakāreṇa tāmeva sadācāranītim anusaratā śāstrārambhaṇe svaśāsturguṇābhidhānapūrvakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā śāstravyākhyānāvatārād atra prayojanamastyeva |
SA19n1285:93: ucyate - śāstrārambhe śāstre praṇāmakaraṇam na niṣphalam śāstari śāstreṣu ca gauravotpādahetvartham , nānyathā |
SA19n1285:95: tasmācca paraiḥ śāstrādau praṇāmakaraṇaṃ niṣprayojanam iti kimucyate ?
SA19n1285:97: śāstram ārabdhuṃ praṇāmakaraṇaṃ tu cikitsādiśāstravat saprayojanam eva,
SA19n1285:99: svaśāstāraṃ praṇamya śālistambasūtropanibaddhāṃ śāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmīti ukte |
SA19n1285:100: katamā ca sā iti cet - munī rājagṛhasyaiva ityādi kathitam rājagṛhaṃ tu rājño gṛham rājaprasāda ityarthaḥ |
SA19n1285:102: tasmādeva saṃgītisūtre ' evaṃ mayā śrutam ityuktam |
SA19n1285:105: bhagavataḥ ekasmin samaye iti ekasmin samaye |
SA19n1285:109: kleśa - skandha - devaputra - mṛtyavo mārā ityākhyātāḥ |
SA19n1285:112: darśana - bhāvanā - mārgāvatāranayena catuḥ smṛtyupasthānādisaptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmabhāvanākrameṇa caturāryasatyabhāvanāvibhāvanatayā skandhatathatāparijñānena anitya - duḥkha - śūnya - nairātmyādīnām aviparīta - jñānānvitatvāt pudgaladharmayornairātmya - grāhyagrāhakābhāva - kalpanād ' idaṃ dhātutrayamapi cittamātram ' iti avagamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇa - rahitadvāreṇa kleśā bhagnāḥ |
SA19n1285:113: nitya - sukha - śuci - sātmyāviparyāsacatuṣṭayādirahitaḥ anuttaradharmakāya saṃyukto'pratiṣṭhita nirvāṇopalabdheḥ skandhaṃ mṛtyumārañca jayati |
SA19n1285:114: sarvadharmān māyā - marīci - gandharvanagara - nirmāṇa - pratibimba - pratiśrutka - alātacakra - svapnavat svavabodhāt saṃkleśālayavijñāna - vāsanā - malāpagatatvācca abhūtasaṃkalpān samucchidya mahāmaitryādi - bāṇākṣepeṇa sasainyaṃ makaradhvajaṃ prahṛtya devaputramāraṃ parājayata |
SA19n1285:122: yadā tannagare kupitairamānuṣaiḥ punaḥ punaragniḥ kṣiptastadā rājā'vagatya ādiśat ,
SA19n1285:124: adya prabhṛti yasya gṛhaṃ prathamaṃ agninā dahyate,
SA19n1285:125: sa śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ gatvā gṛhaṃ nirmāya vased ityājñātavān |
SA19n1285:127: tato rājā amātyānāhūyādiśat - jñānina amātyāḥ jānantu evaṃ ,
SA19n1285:128: mayaiva tannayaprajñāpāt mayaiva tadatikramo mayi na śobhate, anayatvāt |
SA19n1285:133: tadā prathamaṃ rājā tatra gatvā uvāsa |
SA19n1285:135: tatra rājagṛha - mahānagarasya pūrvottarasīmāyāṃ gṛdhrakūṭanāmaka parvate'sti |
SA19n1285:136: yasya parvatasya śikharo gṛdhraśirovat sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvata ityucyate |
SA19n1285:137: athavā pāpena māreṇa gṛdhrākāramabhinirmāya bhagavaccīvaraharaṇārambhe bhagavato'dhiṣṭhānenā - sāmarthyāt tatraiva nikṣiptaṃ,
SA19n1285:142: na, bhikṣūṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaiḥ sārdhaṃ vyavasthitaḥ |
SA19n1285:143: bhikṣūṇāṃ arthāt bhikṣusārdhamardhatrayodaśabhiḥ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena bodhisattvānāṃ ca iti tu saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattva- mahāsattvaiḥ sārdham |
SA19n1285:144: vyavasthitastu utthāna - saṃcakramaṇa - vyavasthiti - śayanādi - caturvidha - caryayā vyavasthitaḥ |
SA19n1285:150: kāya - vākcittaduścarite na pravartata ityartho darśitaḥ |
SA19n1285:153: api ca - kimarthaṃ sthāna - kāla - parivāra - nirdeśaḥ?
SA19n1285:156: yadā brāhmaṇeṣu gṛhastheṣu ca anugrahādi kṛtaṃ tadā nivāsa - sthānaṃ grāma - nagarādi,
SA19n1285:163: tasmāt bhagavato'pi anuttaradharmacakravartirājatvāt sthāna - kāla - pārivārādaya uktāḥ |
SA19n1285:172: kutra kaiścit samaṃ kvāpi kasmāt kasmai ca deśitam |
SA19n1285:177: tadutpādaka īśvarādiḥ ko'pi anyo nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ | api coktam -
SA19n1285:186: dvādaśāṅgaḥ bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī anyo vā yaḥ kaścit kṛtādikaṃ ahetu- pratikūlahetu- virahitaṃ paśyati, sa
SA19n1285:189: aṣṭāṅga māryadharmaṃ phaladharmādhigamasvabhāvatāṃ saskandhanirvāṇaṃ aśeṣa skandhābhidhānamapi ca yathāvat paśyati ityuktvā bhagavāṃstūṣṇīṃ bhāvamavasthitaḥ |
SA19n1285:190: tadā ityādi tu bhikṣuśāriputro bodhisattvaṃ maitreyam upasaṃkramyedaṃ paryapṛcchat |
SA19n1285:191: ityuktvā iti bhagavataḥ śāriputreṇa yatsūtraṃ śrutaṃ tad bhikṣūn uktvā upadiśya |
SA19n1285:192: nāyaka iti vividhopāyanayena sattvānām nayanatvān nāyakaḥ |
SA19n1285:193: tūṣṇīṃbhāvamavasthitaḥ samādhiṃ samāpadya viharati sm ityadhivacanam |
SA19n1285:194: bhikṣuḥ śāriputraḥ śrutvā ityuvāca bhikṣuḥ iti - kleśabhañjanād bhikṣuḥ |
SA19n1285:195: śāriputraḥ śrutvā iti tu bhagavataḥ śrutvā |
SA19n1285:196: sūtre tadāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yatretyādinā deśitavān |
SA19n1285:197: gatvā maitreyasannidhau tu yatra bodhisattvo maitreyo dine sadāvasthitaḥ,
SA19n1285:201: tathāgate'dya maitreya uktyarthaṃ na vibhajya ca |
SA19n1285:202: tṛṣṇīṃbhāve sthite cātra tadartho gamyate katham | ityuktam |
SA19n1285:203: adya maitreya ityuktvā bhikṣūn bhagavān śālistambopamādeśanayā yaduktam - maitreya! sugatoktasūtrāntārthaḥ katamaḥ?
SA19n1285:205: sarvajñagocara -viṣayāṇāmapi sarvaśrāvaka- pratyekabuddha - viṣayātikrāntatvāt pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ?
SA19n1285:210: kiṃ pratītyaṃ ca dharmaḥ kaḥ buddho'pi katamastathā | ityuktam |
SA19n1285:211: kathaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ paśyati |
SA19n1285:212: dharmaṃ paśyan buddhaṃ paśyati? iti tu
SA19n1285:213: pratītyaṃ tu kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaṃ buddhaṃ ca paśyati |
SA19n1285:218: bhāvātmikā hi maitrī syān maitreyo'brūta nirṇayam |
SA19n1285:223: kimuktamiti cet anna bhagavatā ityādi uktam |
SA19n1285:237: jarāmaraṇapratyayāḥ śoka - parideva- duḥkha- daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti |
SA19n1285:238: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
SA19n1285:240: tatra pratītyasamutpādo nāma sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyayaḥ |
SA19n1285:242: api ca - avidyādibhavāṅgā'dīnām ayaṃ sambhavakramaḥ kathamavagantavyaḥ?
SA19n1285:244: karma ca katamad iti cet? ucyate |
SA19n1285:249: sa ca pratītyasamutpādo bāhya ādhyātmikaśca pṛthaktvād dvividho vyavasthāpitaḥ |
SA19n1285:256: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti |
SA19n1285:257: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati phalamabhinirvartayāmīti |
SA19n1285:258: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkura- puṣpābhyām abhinirvartita iti |
SA19n1285:259: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāt phalaparyantaṃ prādurbhavati |
SA19n1285:266: bījaṃ pṛthivyādau kiṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā hetoḥ pratyayaṃ matamiti |
SA19n1285:275: pṛthivyādau rnaivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ bījasaṃdhāraṇādi karomīti |
SA19n1285:276: bījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ eteṣāṃ pratyayena saṃdhāraṇādi kāryeṇa hitaṃ karomi |
SA19n1285:277: atha punaḥ pṛthivyādiṣu satsu bījādaṅkurādi prādurbhavati,
SA19n1285:284: tasmād iti tu avidyādi kramaśaḥ prādurbhavati |
SA19n1285:290: aṣṭāṅgamārga iti tu mithyādṛṣṭi - mithyāsaṃkalpa - mithyāvāk - mithyākarmānta - mithyājīva- mithyāvyāyāma - mithyā - smṛti - mithyāsamādhayaḥ |
SA19n1285:292: pañcadṛṣṭayastu satkāya - anta - dṛṣṭi - śīla - mithyāśceti |
SA19n1285:294: tasmāt kudṛṣṭitvāt mithyā mārgācaraṇena aniṣṭavipākābhinirvartitatvāt hetu - karma - phalāni apavādāropākāreṇa praviṣṭatvān mithyādṛṣṭiriti |
SA19n1285:296: yoniśaḥ sthita- samyakśravaṇa - cintanādayaḥ śraddhāpūrvagatvāt hetu-phala-satya- ratna-karmaphaladi -bhāvadarśanaṃ hi samyakdṛṣṭiḥ |
SA19n1285:297: samyakmārgopayogād abhīṣṭaphalābhinirhāratvād anitya- duḥkha - śūnya - nairātmyā - dyākāreṇa praviṣṭa tvāt samyakdṛṣṭiriti |
SA19n1285:302: nitya - sukha- śuci - ātmādyākārālambanād rāga-dveṣa- mohavṛddheḥ mithyāsaṃkalpaḥ |
SA19n1285:306: cintanaṃ ca idamidaṃ kariṣya iti ādau citte nidhāya kāya - vāk - citta- caryākuśalaḥ,
SA19n1285:308: anitya - duḥkha - śūnya - nairātmyādisu niyojito yo yoniśomana sikārayogaḥ ( sa)
SA19n1285:312: rāga-dveṣa - mohādyākārasambaddhatvād ātmastuti - parapaṃsana - svabhāvena pravṛttā,
SA19n1285:313: caturvidha - vāgdoṣamiśritā samyak - satya - tathatā - sarvadharmaprahīṇā,
SA19n1285:314: rāja - caura- strī -gṛhastha - janakathāsvarūpā tuccha -vyarthatā- bahulā sarvāryajana - ninditatvān mithyāvāg ityucyate |
SA19n1285:315: tatpratikūlatvāt svaparāvisaṃvādākārā rāga- dveṣa - mohādi - rahita - svabhāvā,
SA19n1285:318: sarvakuśaladharmasaṃgrahā hita - paricchinna - svarūpatvād ātmastuti - parapaṃsanavihīnā anitya - duḥkha - śūnya(tā)
SA19n1285:319: - nairātmyādi - rūpeṇa pravṛtteḥ sarvārya janāvisaṃvādinī samyaṅmārgānusāritvāt samyagvāg ityucyate |
SA19n1285:321: karmeti kāya - vāk - citta- duṣkṛta - bījavapanād akṣayavipākaphalābhinirvartita - svabhāvākuśala - karmānta - kāritvāt kṣārādidoṣasaṃsṛṣṭakukṣetre kubījavapanavad anabhīṣṭavipākābhi - nirvartitatvāt paṃsanīyaḥ karmāntastu mithyākarmānta ityucyate |
SA19n1285:322: karmarati - nidrārati - vādaratyādi - svabhāvaṃ mithyākarma ityucyate |
SA19n1285:325: aviparītakarmakṛttvāt kāya-vāk - citta- sukṛtabījavapanāt satkṣetrasadṛśasukṛtakarmakṣetre'bhīṣṭavipākābhinirvartita - vidhi - pravṛtteḥ,
SA19n1285:332: kapaṭa - lapana- naiṣpeśikatva - naimittikatvena pravṛtya avipanna - kāya - vāgādyupajīvikayā puruṣa - stryādi - nimittadeśanena astra- aśva- kāvya - cikitsāparīkṣā - saṃkhyā - gṛhasthaparīkṣā - kumāraparīkṣā - sāmudrika - lakṣaṇaparīkṣā - nimittajñānādau svaparavisaṃvādarūpeṇa pravṛtteḥ tannayena cīvara - piṇḍādi - sādhanānuvṛttyā vihārastu mithyājīva ityucyate |
SA19n1285:334: samyak tu vidyāviyukta - kāya - vāk - cittapravṛtyā cīvarādi - sādhanam ,
SA19n1285:335: tannayena ājīvaḥ samyagājīvānusaraṇatvāt svaparāvi - saṃvādasvarūpākāratvād āryamārgānuvartitvāt,
SA19n1285:345: kṣetra - vidyā - vyāpāra- rājyādi - svaparāpakāri - kāya - vāk - citta- pravṛtta - vividhākārārabdhāḥ kriyāḥ prayatnāśca mithyāvyāyāma ityucyante |
SA19n1285:348: yā kāyavākcittacaryāsvaparopakāra - mātrakuśalapravṛtyā āryamārgam anusarati sā samyagvyāyāmatvāt samyakvyāyāmaḥ |
SA19n1285:353: kālatrayaviṣayeṣu pūrvahāsa- ānandānubhūta - rūpa- śabda- gandha - rasa- sparśādīn anusmaran anukathanam |
SA19n1285:354: tatrāpi adhyavasāna - anurāga- pratighatādi - paridveṣatvāt svaparāpakārakāritvād,
SA19n1285:357: guṇānusmaraṇaṃ pūrvīkṛtya buddha -dharma- saṃgha - śīla - tyāga - devādyanusmaraṇaṃ samyaksmṛtiḥ mārgāṅgam eva ucyate |
SA19n1285:361: samādhirapi bhūtatvān mithyāsamādhiḥ mithyeti tu viparyayaḥ |
SA19n1285:362: īśvara- svabhāva - kāla - pradhānādhyātmātmādyasatsu tatrālambanapūrvakaṃ yaccitta - spharaṇaṃ syāt,
SA19n1285:363: api tu - rūpādi - bāhyavastūni anitya - duḥkha - śūnya - nairātmyākārīṇi nitya - sukha- śucyātma dṛṣṭayāditayā adhyavasīya teṣu ālambanapūrvakaṃ yaccittaspharaṇam ,
SA19n1285:373: evam yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati |
SA19n1285:375: viśuddhātmā hi yaḥ paśyed dharmatathyaṃ sa paśyati |
SA19n1285:378: sarvasaṃkleśālaya - vijñānabījavāsanāmalāpagatatvād āśrayaparāvṛttimayaṃ manogocarācintyā - prameyaguṇamaṇyalaṅkṛtāyāḥ svaparādhīnātmaka pratyātmavedyasarvasattvārthanirantarānābhoga kṛtātma - sarvaprapañcarahitāyāḥ śamathavipaśyanā- yuganaddha - sarvadharma - tathatāyāḥ adhigamatvāt kleśa - jñeyāvaraṇagirigahvaravanamūla - vidahanasvabhāvatānuttarasamyak - saṃphalaṃ śaikṣajñānaṃ tu phala dharma ityucyate |
SA19n1285:388: ādimadhyāntarahitam advayaṃ dhātutrayavirahitaṃ kāya-vāk - cittakarmasamatikrāntaṃ maṇiratnarājavividharūpasadṛśaṃ guṇamaṇivividhaprabhābhiḥ nirantaraṃ jagadarthakāri śāntaṃ,
SA19n1285:391: evaṃ tadvat - saṃkleśa- vyavadānātmaka- sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharma- tathatāyāḥ yathāsthitivadavagatatvād buddha ityucyate |
SA19n1285:394: tathoktamāryaṃ dṛṣṭatvād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati |
SA19n1285:400: yaḥ paśyatīti yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ dharmañcaivaṃ paśyati sa dharmajaḥ,
SA19n1285:402: tatrā'tra pratītyasamutpādaḥ kīdṛśa ukta iti cet |
SA19n1285:404: prāṇādirahitād yaśca iti tu yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satataṃ prāṇādirahitaṃ prāṇarahitam,
SA19n1285:411: imāni sarvāṇi bāhyābhyantarāṇi vastūni sajīvāni indriyānvitāni |
SA19n1285:414: ye prāṇinaḥ prāṇino na bhakṣanti te prāṇinastu mokṣaṃ prāpnuvantīti ucyate |
SA19n1285:421: te'pi parasparamanyonyakalpanā - parikalpanā - vikalpa - rahitvāt tṛṇa - vṛkṣa - bhitti - dharmasadṛśā acalāḥ niṣkriyāśca tasmāt prāṇādirahitatvād ajīvāḥ |
SA19n1285:430: bāhyavastuṣu sūryasya candrasya ca sparśavaśena layo vistaraśca anumīyete |
SA19n1285:432: vāyusañcāravaśād vṛkṣa-śākhādi-kampanānumānāt teṣāṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kuta upalabhyate |
SA19n1285:434: chinne utpāda iti ayam artho'siddha eva iti darśayitum ucyate |
SA19n1285:437: anicchādicaryāṃ prārthanādiṃ vā tato'nyatragamanaṃ vā'lpamapi na kurvanti |
SA19n1285:441: sacetanānām aṅga-pratyaṅgādicchedānutpāda- dharmitvād acetanatāyā eva prasaṅgo jāyate |
SA19n1285:458: vyupaśāntyantamiti tu upaśamam ante darśayituṃ vyupaśamaparyantam |
SA19n1285:459: yastu etādṛśanayena dharmaṃ satatam ajīvādisvabhāvaṃ paśyati |
SA19n1285:460: pratītyaṃ dharmabuddhau ca śuddhibuddhayā hi paśyati |
SA19n1285:464: āryadharmamabhisaṃbudhya iti tu yo pāpadharmāṇāṃ pāre arthāt dūre sa āryaḥ |
SA19n1285:474: tathāpi yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmakṛtānuttarabodhyaśaikṣasvabhāvatāṃ paśyati |
SA19n1285:475: yena sa āryajñānagocaradharmaṃ tādṛśaṃ svayathāvad abhisaṃbodheḥ dharmajñaḥ,
SA19n1285:476: dharmanirmāṇaṃ dharmadarśanam buddhadarśanam iti bhagavatā uktam |
SA19n1285:486: buddhotpādo bhavenno vā sthiteyaṃ dharmatā yataḥ |
SA19n1285:489: atrāhetuḥ pratikūlahetuḥ vā pravartako nivartako vā ko'pi nāsti |
SA19n1285:490: tasmāt tathāgatānāmutpādādvā anutpādād vā dharmato dharmasthitito dharmaniyamataśca eṣa pravāhaḥ, ityuktam |
SA19n1285:491: yadi pratyayarahitena ekenaiva hetunā bhāvā utpadya tiṣṭhanti,
SA19n1285:492: yadi pratyayo'pi hetumanapekṣya kiñcidutpādayituṃ samarthaḥ cettadā te sthitā asthitā iti vaktuṃ yujyeta,
SA19n1285:493: teṣāmutpādaḥ phalodbhavo'pi nāhetor na cāpratyayāt tathāgatānāmutpādo vā'nutpādo vā eṣā dharmatā dharmasthitatā ca āditaḥ pravartete ||
SA19n1285:494: tadyathā - pratītyasamutpādasya dharma etatpratyayatāphalamiti bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa uktaḥ |
SA19n1285:498: hetupratyaya-kramavat pratītyasamutpādasamateti hetvabhāve pratyayāpravṛttiḥ pratyayābhāve ca na hetu-pravṛttiḥ |
SA19n1285:506: evamapi pratītyasamutpādo'yam ityādi hetupratyayadvividhatvād hetupratyayobhayārtha pratītyasamutpādasya kramo'bhyupagantavyaḥ |
SA19n1285:511: evaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaviśeṣeṇa pṛthag hetupratyayānāṃ lakṣaṇa - bhedaḥ kīdṛśa iti cet |
SA19n1285:513: tatra katamo bāhyaḥ sahetukaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti uktvā tadidam - bījādaṅkuraḥ |
SA19n1285:517: nālādgaṇḍaḥ gaṇḍād garbham [garbhācchūkaḥ] puṣpāt phalam ityuktam |
SA19n1285:523: bīje sati aṅkura - kāṇḍādi -phala - paryantānāṃ prādurbhāvād,
SA19n1285:525: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkurādi abhinirvartayāmi iti |
SA19n1285:526: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījādinā abhinirvartitaḥ iti |
SA19n1285:527: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti |
SA19n1285:528: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti |
SA19n1285:529: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāditaḥ phalādi paryantaṃ prādurbhāvaḥ |
SA19n1285:532: pratyayastu pṛthivyādi kālāntaṃ hi yathā kramam |
SA19n1285:533: tasmādeva kathaṃ bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya ityādi uktam |
SA19n1285:534: bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandhāḥ katidhā draṣṭavyā ityuktam ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt |
SA19n1285:536: pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātūnāṃ yathākramaṃ samavāyād bāhyapratītyasamutpādasyeti pratyayatā yathākramam |
SA19n1285:538: eṣām hetupratyayānāṃ katamasya karma katamad iti cet?
SA19n1285:542: tatra pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karotīti bījamaṅkurotpādonmukhamāśrayatvāt kaṭhinatvameva ucyate |
SA19n1285:544: tejo dhātuḥ paripācayatīti paripuṣṭayavasare upapadyamāne paraspara - sparśeṇoṣṇatā eva paripāka iti ucyate |
SA19n1285:546: svāvasthāyāḥ samuddhṛtya bahirā nayanād vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati vardhayatīti ucyate |
SA19n1285:549: ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmanakṛtyaṃ karotīti ṛturapi sarvākāraṃ abhinirharati |
SA19n1285:554: no cet pratyayasāmagrī bīje bhūte'pi nāṅkuraḥ |
SA19n1285:560: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃghātakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
SA19n1285:568: na svato parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ |
SA19n1285:573: atra na kaścidutpadyate na ca kaścin nirudhyate |
SA19n1285:582: tasmād vastūnāṃ svabhāvata utpādo na yujyate,
SA19n1285:584: yasyānusāraṃ bhāvāḥ satataṃ sthitāḥ tadanusāram utpāda - kriyā- karma - sthiti - vināśā api na yujyante,
SA19n1285:585: utpāda- kriyā- karma - sthiti- vināśā api sākṣād avabhāsante |
SA19n1285:586: tasmād atra doṣasya prasajyamānatvān na svata ityuktam |
SA19n1285:587: bhāvānām svata utpādaścet nityamutpādaprasaṃgaḥ syāt, ākāśavat |
SA19n1285:588: kasyacidapi kutrāpi kadāpi utpādo nirodho vā nāstīti cet-ucyate- pratyakṣavirodhaḥ |
SA19n1285:590: tasmāt tāvad bhāvānāṃ na svabhāvata utpādaḥ |
SA19n1285:595: tathā sati gamana- āgamana - calana - kampana - nirākaraṇa - manyanā - kriyā- karmāṇi tatraiva anyatrāpi ca pravartante |
SA19n1285:603: ayaṃ hetuḥ śayanopamayā na yujyate saṃghātatvāt |
SA19n1285:605: katham ātmā asaṃghātaḥ san svaśarīrābhāve śayanādīn aṅgasaṃghān svarūpeṇopakartuṃ yujyate |
SA19n1285:609: ātmanaḥ saṃghātatvād hetupratyayayorutpādopalabdha ātmātmīya iti manyanākārapravṛtteḥ cittamevātmā ityucyate |
SA19n1285:610: atrāntaḥ karaṇapuruṣaḥ kūrmakeśasvabhāvavad yuktyanumānarahitastu kvacinnāstīti darśayitum bhagavatā bāhyādhyātmikabhāvānāṃ parata utpādo na yujyata ityuktam |
SA19n1285:611: yadi bhāvānāṃ svato'pi notpādo na ca parato'pi ,
SA19n1285:612: tadā bhāvānāṃ dvividha utpāda iti cet,
SA19n1285:614: na dvayoḥ na ca kālata ityuktam |
SA19n1285:616: anye tu svaparayoḥ sambandhād bhāvotpādaṃ manyante |
SA19n1285:618: tathāpi svato'nupalabdhatvāt parataścābhāvāt na dvayoḥ ityuktam |
SA19n1285:619: hetu-pratyayātiriktaṃ na svato na parata iti bhagavatā uktam |
SA19n1285:621: tadā paratantreṇa kartrā utpādavināśau bhaviṣyata iti kaiściducyate |
SA19n1285:622: anye tīrthikāstu karttā nāma kaścid ādyaḥkartā,
SA19n1285:624: sa eva bāhyamābhyantarañcedaṃ sarvam utpādayati vināśayatīti manyante |
SA19n1285:627: atha kasyeti cet - hetupratyayasambandhād bhāvānāṃ pravṛttirbhāsate |
SA19n1285:628: kartustu ākāśavan nirvikāratvāt tadadhīnā utpāda - sthitivināśāśca naiva yujyante |
SA19n1285:630: karttari nirvikāra- niṣkriyākāśātmani kriyā karma ca kiñcidapi nāsti |
SA19n1285:631: utpadyamānā bhāvā hetupratyayāpekṣāḥ pravṛtti - kramodbhūtā eva bhāsante |
SA19n1285:632: yadanusāraṃ karttāramapekṣate pravṛttistadanusāraṃ bhāvānām utpāda- sthiti-vināśāśca sadā āsannā bhavanti |
SA19n1285:633: karturnityatvād bhāvānām utpādao- sthiti-vināśā yugapad bhaviṣyanti athavā utpāda - sthiti-vināśā na bhaviṣyanti |
SA19n1285:634: nityatvāt kvacidapi kiñcidapi utpādo vā vināśo vā na syāt |
SA19n1285:635: hetuṃ pratyayañca apekṣya pravartamānānāṃ bhāvānāmeva kartṛ- kriyā- hetuphalotpādasamaḥ kramodbhava upalabhyate |
SA19n1285:636: anutpannā- kāśotpalādīnāntu utpāda- sthiti - vināśā na yujyante |
SA19n1285:637: avikārahetubhiḥ parasparamāśritya pravartamānaiḥ utpādaniyamo na yujyate |
SA19n1285:640: hetau phale ca saṃbhinne'vikārastu kathaṃ bhavet |
SA19n1285:642: kriyānanvitavandhyāputrātmani kasyāścit kriyāyāḥ karmaṇo vā niyatena ayuktatvād bhagavaddharmeṣu avisaṃvāditvād bhāvotpādakriyā karttāraṃ nāpekṣate,
SA19n1285:643: kintu sati hetupratyayasaṅgrahe bhāvānāmutpādavināśau yujyeta ityuktam |
SA19n1285:647: anyaiḥ sattvabhājanalokayorutpāda- sthiti - vināśāstu īśvarakṛtapraṇāśā avagamyante,
SA19n1285:648: tadīśvarecchāvaśāt kāya - bhūmitraya - kartrādisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi śrūyate |
SA19n1285:649: anye tasyaiva cittotpādamātreṇa naraka- preta- tiryak - deva- manuṣyadayāśca sattvāḥ jvara- viṣa- vyādhi - strī - puruṣa - napuṃsaka - sukṛtarūpa - vikṛtarūpa - dasyu- jihma - caurāḥ kāmamithyācāra - prāṇātipāta - mṛṣāvāda - madyapāna - dyūtapraveśa - pratyanta -śabara- ḍombī - nirdaya - krūra - pāruṣyavāda- brahmaghāta- mātṛpitṛghātaka - vyādhādayaḥ ,
SA19n1285:651: sukha - duḥkhādayaḥ svargo vimokṣaśca tāni sarvāṇi cittotpādamātreṇoddhṛtānīti vadanti |
SA19n1285:654: gatānugatikāścaiva yuktiviśeṣarahite tasmin gauravapravaṇatvāt pūrvottaraviruddhaṃ bālayuvakacāṇḍālavadayathārtha pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ ,
SA19n1285:660: yuktyāgamādiviruddhaṃ ca vāṅmātreṇa pakṣīkṛtya nijājñānapaṭalena netrācchādanatvād asamarthatvāt paśubhūtāstu paśubhyo'pyatichudratarāḥ paśavaḥ |
SA19n1285:663: utpāde sthitau ca sahetuka evābhyupagamyamāne sati nityavādabhaṅgatvād vādotsargaḥ,
SA19n1285:665: icchāmātreṇa utpāde sati yugapadeva sampūrṇajagata utpādasthiti-vināśāḥ syuḥ |
SA19n1285:668: duḥkha -kuhanā- jihma- aśuci- akṛtajñatādyuddharaṇānāṃ tu prayojanaviśeṣābhāvācca asiddhārthatā |
SA19n1285:678: kasyacidapi bhāvasya utpāda - sthiti - vināśā na yujyante |
SA19n1285:683: gambhīryaguṇa - darśana - caryā - cintanādi na yujyate |
SA19n1285:684: ekāntakriyāyuktā yuktayorgāmbhīryaguṇasya rūpādervā ālambana cintanasyaiva ayuktatvāt,
SA19n1285:686: hetāvasati sarvatra pratyaya eva kathaṃ bhavet |
SA19n1285:688: bhāvakartā maheśaścet so'pi kartā na manyate |
SA19n1285:689: pitrabhāve sutotpattiḥ sā neṣṭā dṛśyate na ca |
SA19n1285:693: tathā maheśvare nitye bhāvānāṃ syāt sadodbhavaḥ |
SA19n1285:698: tasmādīśvarakartṛtvābhyupagame bahudoṣasaṃbhavād bhagavatā bhāvānām utpādaḥ īśvarakṛto na yujyate ityuktam |
SA19n1285:699: pare tu sarvaṃ kālena vivartitaṃ manyante |
SA19n1285:710: sa nityaścettadā tatra kriyāpekṣā na yujyate |
SA19n1285:716: evaṃ kālavādināṃ kālavaśena bhāvānāmutpāda - sthiti - vināśābhyu- pagamasyāpi ayuktatvāt tadapyasamañjasameva |
SA19n1285:717: sūryacandra- nakṣatra - parva- vatsarādi - bāhyābhyantarabhāvānāṃ gatagamyasvabhāvatvāt kālākhyayā bhāvānāmutpāda- sthiti - vināśāstu kālapariṇāmatvena na yujyante |
SA19n1285:718: anyacca, svabhāvavādina āntarabāhyān sarvabhāvān svabhāvodbhavān manyante |
SA19n1285:720: kasyacidbhāvasya utpādasya vināśasya vā kaścidapi heturnāsti |
SA19n1285:721: khara- snigdha- uṣṇa- laghutva- ślakṣṇa - tīkṣṇāni svabhāva eva |
SA19n1285:722: madhura - amla - lavaṇa - kaṭukāni asattvabhedā eva |
SA19n1285:724: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sadā sthitam |
SA19n1285:727: vikāro vartate yatra nirvikāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet |
SA19n1285:731: kule rājani kṣetrādau tatphalaṃ cāpi bhāsate |
SA19n1285:732: svabhāve vikṛte jāte nityavādī tu bhraṃsate |
SA19n1285:734: evaṃ svabhāvavādiṣvapi parasparavirodhatvād utpāda - sthiti - vināśānāṃ svabhāvād udbhavo na yujyata ityuktam |
SA19n1285:735: atha bhāvānām utpāda - sthiti - vināśā ahetuto bhavanti ityapare'hetuvādino hetuṃ vinaiva kevalam bhāvānāmutpāda - nirodhau kalpayanti |
SA19n1285:737: hetoḥ aniścitatvāt kṛtapraṇāśa- akṛtābhyāgama- anavasthāśca bhaviṣyanti |
SA19n1285:738: sukṛta- duṣkṛtādi - pitṛ - putra - brāhmaṇa - rājanya - vaiśya - śūdra- śvapacādi - śucyaśuci - gamyāgamya - bhakṣyābhakṣya - devapiśācādi - dāna - vinaya - saṃyama - japa - tapasyā - upavāsa - niścaya - yāgajñānājñāna - hetvaniścayāt parasparabhedanirṇaya - vyavasthāpi na saṃbhavati |
SA19n1285:739: tasmāttasyaiva doṣasya prasajyamānatvād ahetuvādo'pi lokādi - viruddhatvād asiddha eva |
SA19n1285:740: ye cānye pradhāna - paramāṇvādyahetu - pratikūlahetuvādādayaste'pi tenaiva niṣedhi - tavyāḥ | tasmān |
SA19n1285:741: na svataḥ parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ |
SA19n1285:744: iti tu anādi - kālataḥ prapañca - vāsanābījasya avicchinna - nadīstrotaḥ - pravāhavad anupravṛtteḥ
SA19n1285:746: tasmādeva sūtre atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātusamavāyād bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati ityuktam |
SA19n1285:747: 'atha punaḥ' iti tu abhāvādudbhava- sva - para - dvaya- īśvarādi - rahita - bīja - pṛthivyādi - sāmagryā eva aṅkurādi utpadyata iti uktam |
SA19n1285:752: śāśvatato na cocchedān na saṅkrānteḥ parīttataḥ |
SA19n1285:762: na cocchedāditi na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate nācāpyaniruddhād |
SA19n1285:763: api tu bījād niruddhāt tasminneva samaye'ṅkuro utpadyate |
SA19n1285:765: na saṃkrāntitaḥ iti tu bījāṅkurau tu asadṛśau eva |
SA19n1285:767: parīttataḥ hetoriti - parīttabījavapanān mahāphalāvāptiriti tatparītta - hetorbahuphalābhinirvṛttiḥ,
SA19n1285:770: sadṛśānuprabodhād iti tu yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśameva phalābhinirvṛtiriti |
SA19n1285:779: upte śālyādi bīje hi śyāmākādiphalaṃ na hi |
SA19n1285:785: tathaivādhyātmikasyāpi bāhya - pratītyasamutpādavad hetupratyayākāradvayopa- nibandhanatvāt pṛthak dvividho'vagantavyaḥ |
SA19n1285:786: dvidhā hetuścapratyaya iti tu ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo hetūpanibandhanaḥ pratyayopanibandhanaśca dvayākāro'vagantavyaḥ |
SA19n1285:787: iṣṭa iti abhīṣṭasya ca abhipretasya abhimatasya cetyadhivacanam |
SA19n1285:792: yattayormadhye syāt tat tu madhya iṣyate |
SA19n1285:803: jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇa - śoka - parideva - duḥkha - daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti |
SA19n1285:804: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati | ityuktam |
SA19n1285:807: kleśa - karma - jāti - paratantro 'yamātmāpi aṃśatrayeṇa vyavasthāpyate |
SA19n1285:810: tatra kleśa paratantra - svabhāvatāyā aṅgāni trīṇi - avidyātṛṣṇopādānāni |
SA19n1285:811: karma - paratantra - svabhāvatāyāḥ dve aṅge - bhavasaṃskārau |
SA19n1285:820: śoka- paridevanā - daurmanasya - upāyāsādīnāṃ priyaviyogā- priyasaṃprayoga - kāmavipattyādīnāṃ ca saṃgrahaḥ |
SA19n1285:821: evam ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśāṅgaḥ trisvabhāvatayā veditavyaḥ |
SA19n1285:824: avidyā yadi nādau syādante mṛtyurna saṃbhaved |
SA19n1285:825: ' avidyā yadi nādau syād' iti tu yadi avidyā cennābhaviṣyan naiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante |
SA19n1285:826: tadvad jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ cennābhaviṣyan naiva śokādi prajñāsyate |
SA19n1285:827: tebhyo bhinno na kutrāpi hyātmātmīyaśca vidyate |
SA19n1285:828: tatrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārādi abhinirvartayāmītyato jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ śokādi abhinirvartayāmīti |
SA19n1285:830: evam yāvajjarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirabhinirvartitā iti |

SA19n1285:1458: tada-yuktatvāduktam- api tu maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
SA19n1285:1459: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikā skandhā prārdubhavanti,
SA19n1285:1468: yaḥ kaścid imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambaṃ śivamabhayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati |
SA19n1285:1496: tucchata iti muktātmano hrasvalohavad ekāntasya abhāvāt |
SA19n1285:1502: anityata iti sahopapādavināśaḥ skandhāt pṛthaganyana svabhāvāt |
SA19n1285:1504: śūnyata iti kalpanā svabhāvatayā abhūta-parikalpanāyāḥ pṛthakatvābhāvāt |
SA19n1285:1508: kiṃ kathaṃ vā kutaḥ kena kalpavādādi hānitaḥ |
SA19n1285:1511: tathatārthaṃ sa eva pūrvāntaṃ na pratisarati ityuktam |
SA19n1285:1514: ahaṃ devo vā gandharvo vā kiṃ sukhavihāro duḥkhavihāro'bhūvamityayaṃ moho'bhāva eva |
SA19n1285:1519: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate'dhvani iti ca āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmi iti moho'pyatra nāstyeva |
SA19n1285:1520: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate'dhvani iti anāgate'dhvani devo vā piśāco vā naro vā kiṃ vā bhaviṣyāmīti atra mohasyāpyanudbhava eva |
SA19n1285:1521: sukhī vā duḥkhī vā surūpo vā kurūpo vā kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi iti moho'pyatra nāsti |
SA19n1285:1522: antarapi na pratisarati iti antarna muhyati |
SA19n1285:1523: kiṃ nvidamiti ātmā nirātmā vā iti |
SA19n1285:1524: kathaṃ nvidamiti kiṃ sarūpo'thavā virūpo veti moho'tra nodbhavati |
SA19n1285:1525: ke santa iti sukṛta-karmakāriṇaḥ duṣkṛta-karmakāriṇo veti na mohotpādaḥ |
SA19n1285:1526: ayaṃ sattvo devagaternaragatervā kuta āgata itaścyuto deveṣu manuṣyeṣu narake prete tiryañci vā kutra gamiṣyatīti moho'tra na sambhavati |
SA19n1285:1533: viparītadhāraṇā-samutthānārthaṃ pudgalavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu punargamanatvāt pudgala iti skandha -vyatiriktaḥ |
SA19n1285:1534: yasyāmuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā paraloka-gamanasya paralokaṃ vihāya amuṃ etallokagamanasya cābhāvāt grahaṇa-durviparītagrahaṇamityuktam |
SA19n1285:1545: amunau munisaṃjñayā ṣaḍjagaccakra-praviṣṭa-buddhimato gamanaṃ gamyaṃ ca saṃsāramevānusaranti na tu nirvāṇamiti |
SA19n1285:1546: teṣāṃ samyak prajñayā darśane caturvidhaviparyaya-rahitatvāt samucchinnamūlāni tālavṛkṣamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpāda-nirodhadharmāṇi iti |
SA19n1285:1554: tathā iti yathā candrasya rūpe dūrasthite'pi parīttajalabhājaneṣu jale vipulatailapātreṣu vā avabhāsate |
SA19n1285:1557: evam asmānna kaściccyuto na gato nāgato,
SA19n1285:1559: tadvajjalabhājanavat sattvasantānasya jagataḥ sthānāntareṣu bahurūpeṇa cittacandrabimbotpādaḥ,
SA19n1285:1565: karmakleśa-lipta-cittasantānaṃ vahnistrotonibaddhamindhanaṃ tu karmakleśata eva syāditi parīkṣyate |
SA19n1285:1568: tadvad atrāpi karmakleśendhanamucchidya saṃkleśālaya - vijñānabījao-santāne jñānāgni -saṃyogād dagdhe sati hetu -nirodhān na phalodbhavaḥ |
SA19n1285:1569: tasmādevoktam - yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇa-brāhmāṇānāṃ tadyathā iti ito bāhyānām lokastu lokaḥ |
SA19n1285:1575: tadyathā - ātmavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu pañcopādāna-skandheṣu rūpa-vedanā-saṃjñā-saṃskāra-vijñārnoṣvati ātmātmīya-rahiteṣu,
SA19n1285:1579: yaścāpi saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣadharmasmṛtyupasthāna-samyakprahāṇa-ṛddhipāda-indriya-bala-bodhyaṅga-mārga-pratītyasamutpāda-dhyāna-arūpi-apramāṇa-ṣaḍanusmṛtyādiyadharmapudgalanairātmya-bodhicittabhāvanā-samādhi-dhāraṇā-śraddhā-vīrya-samādhi-prajñā-bhūmi-vaśīkārā-bhijñāna-jñāna -pāramitā-vimuktidvāra-kṣānti-bhāvanādi-krameṇa lokottaramārgānugata-tvād adhimukticaryāyāṃ pratisthāpya niryāṇa -prayoga-sākṣātkārād indriya-bala-abhayao-asaṃsṛṣṭa-pratisaṃvid-vyañjana-mahāpuruṣa-lakṣaṇa-ṛddhipādādi bhāvanāṃ paripūrya anuttarasamyak -samavabodhāvabodhāt śamatha-vipaśyanānukūla-samabhāvo bhāvane'nantā-cintyaguṇyaṃ śāntasvabhāvakāyaṃ,
SA19n1285:1582: tatra rūpaskandhastu rūpāvabhāsākāra-vijñaptyavabhāsa-vikalpodbhūto'neka-dravyātmako bhūtabhautika-rūpa-lakṣaṇa ekādaśao-sāmānyātmaka-pañcadravyākārāropa-saṃghaṭṭitaḥ cakṣuḥ - śrotrādirūpa-śabdādikāma-rūpa-arūpa-pratisaṃyuktābhūtaparikalpanā-lakṣaṇaḥ skandho dhātvāyatana-indriya -vijñāna- viṣayātmako'tha ca tādṛganyatādṛgrūpa-lakṣaṇo dharmastu rūpaskandha iti |
SA19n1285:1587: saṃjñā sūkṣma-sthūla-mahāṅgatādi -citrīkārāva-bhāsākāra-vijñapti-rvikalpanāvaśodbhūta-pūrvahasana -nandana-krīḍanādi-kānanusmṛtya strī-puruṣādi-nimittaviśeṣagrahaṇātmikā viṣayendriya -vijñānabhedena ṣaṭkāyā saṃjñā |
SA19n1285:1591: pūrvākṣiptālaya-vijñānād astitva-vāsanā-bhedena tu dhātoḥ ākāra-viśeṣānanta-prasarānvitasya saṃskāra-skandha-saṃgṛhītatvāt saṃskāraskandha iti |
SA19n1285:1594: vikalpanāvaśodbhūtālaya-vijñānasya vāsanopanibaddhatvād dhātorākāra-viśeṣa- bhedenānantaprasaro hi vijñānaskandha iti |
SA19n1285:1595: teṣāmapyevaṃ dhātvāyatana-sāsrava-saṃskṛta-saṃkleśādi -paryāyabhedena sva-lakṣaṇasambandhena saṃkṣipya skandho dhāturāyatanamiti |
SA19n1285:1597: tathāpi tatra ādāveva kartrādirahito riktastuccho'sāra iti viditvā caturāryasatya -bhāvanānulomapravṛttyā nirṇīto lokottara-jñānāgni-samudbhūto-'vidyāndhakārādi-rahito hetupratyayārthatathatāparijñānāt śānto dharmakāyo'vagamyate |
SA19n1285:1599: tatra duḥkha-satyam-anityatā-duḥkhatā-śūnyatā-nairātmya-samyaganudarśanajñānena kṣānti-mukti-prahāṇa-viśeṣānāntaryajñānena ca tad-duḥkhamavagamya kleśālayavijñānavāsanāṃ saṃnihatya pudgaladharmanairātmyam avabudhya,
SA19n1285:1601: skandhādau dhātau āyatane ca grāhya-grāhakatāṃ vihāya dharmanairātmyasamatāyāṃ praviśe,
SA19n1285:1606: hetupratyayao-rahitatvāt mārgasatye'pi mārga-nyāya-pratipatti-nairyāṇika-sandarśane evaṃ darśana -bhāvanā -ānantarya -prahāṇa-vimukti -viśeṣamārgānukūlatāyai ālayavijñāne vidyamānāṃ vāsanāṃ saṃnihatya pudgaladharma-nairātmya-samatāvabodhāt trikāyādhiṣṭhāna-śānta-dharmakāyasyācintyā-prameyaguṇa-gaṇasya ādimadhyāntarahitasya avicchinna-nābhogakaraṇātmaka-sarvārthānāṃ anuttaraṃ sarvajñatvaṃ prāpnoti | api coktam -
SA19n1285:1610: sa eva pudgaladharmanairātmyakṣamatānvitatvād anuttarasamyaksambodhiṃ vyākṛtavat paśyet,
SA19n1285:1612: tasmāt sūtre- yo bhadanta śāriputra kulaputro kuladuhitā vā evaṃvidha - dharmakṣānti -samanvitaḥ,
SA19n1285:1613: tasya tathāgato'rhat samyaksambuddho'nuttaraḥ samyaksambodhiṃ vyākaroti ityuktam |
SA19n1285:1617: bodhisattvo maitreyo'pi śālistambopamā kṛtā idaṃ sūtram vistareṇa vibhajya bhāṣitavān |
SA19n1285:1618: bodhisattvamaitreyeṇa bhāṣitāṃ śālistambopamāṃ kṛtvā śāriputrastu tacchrutvā iti śālistambopamā kṛtā |
SA19n1285:1623: saṃstuta iti tvayā yathoktaṃ tathaiva asti nānyatheti,
SA19n1285:1627: tasmādeva sūtre- atha āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitam abhinandya utthāyāsanāt prakrānta ityuktam |
SA19n1285:1628: maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamuktaṃ maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena,
SA19n1285:1632: gatvā bhikṣubhyo gambhīrodārādbhutaṃ sūtraṃ yathāśrutavat sarvasattvahitāya bhāṣitam |
SA19n1285:1636: bhāratīyopādhyāyena dharmaśrībhadreṇa lokacakṣuṣā bhadantasādhumatinā jñāna kumāreṇa cānūditā |
SA19n1285:1637: mahāsaṃśodhaka - lokacakṣuṣā bhadanta - śrīkuṭīreṇa saṃśodhya nirṇītā |
